projectsDescription: These are some of the projects I developed using modern and good practices.
calendarAppDescription: A calendar web application for keeping your agenda, managing your events and meetings. Allows you to create events, edit them and delete them.
journalAppDescription: A personal journal for the day, allows you to create, edit and delete entries. You can also store images thanks to Cloudinary.
heroesAppDescription: A simple app that lists Marvel and DC heroes, allows you to search by name and offers a detailed view of each hero.
